p.p: Describes the possible endorsements that a dispenser may apply to a prescription.
This will generally be present in an Observation act where the code attribute has an id value of "DE" from the PrescriptionAnnotation vocabulary.
Note: The PPA systems are Euro compliant. Hence, the inclusion of endorsement codes for pence or cents.

The concepts defined by this code system are maintained externally by the Electronic Prescription Service (EPS).
For guidance please refer to the NPFIT-ETP-EIM-0015 Guidance for Endorsement in the Electronic Prescription
Service.

concept.displayName: Additional Information - additional item has been dispensed when the prescribed product does not contain an administration mechanism.
Invoice Price for less common products or special items
